mapper.select: /* Sta_Item.xml - callItemLive */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_item_live(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
/* Sta_Item.xml - callItemTotal */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_item_total(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
/* Sta_Item.xml - callItemGender */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_item_gender(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
/* Sta_Item.xml - callItemAge */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_item_age(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
/* Sta_Item.xml - callItemBroad */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_item_broadcast(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
/* Sta_Item.xml - callItemClip */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_item_clip(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
/* Sta_Item.xml - callMailboxList */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_item_mailbox(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
